title: Vegetarian three bean salad
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (400g) tin green beans, drained and rinsed', '4 spring onions, chopped', '1 stalk celery, sliced', '100ml (4 fl oz) cider vinegar', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1/2 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper (optional)']
